presets.description: True 2A03 chip emulation with NES Osc modules.

presets.description: Portamento test using Slew on pitch CV.

presets.description: Quantized pitch steps from an LFO source.

presets.description: Stringy pad through the Ensemble chorus.

presets.description: Audio In monitoring chain with reverb.

presets.description: Twanged spring reverb with drive.

presets.name: Wavefolder Drive
presets.description: Buchla-style wavefolding on a saw wave.

presets.name: Granular Cloud
presets.description: Shimmering granular repeats with pitch and density control.

presets.name: Jarre Arp (Ch1)
presets.description: Equinoxe-style bright arpeggio sequence. MIDI Channel 1.

presets.name: Jarre Pad (Ch2)
presets.description: Warm Equinoxe strings/pad with slow attack. MIDI Channel 2.

presets.name: Jarre Bass (Ch3)
presets.description: ARP 2600 style bass - Saw + PWM, no resonance. MIDI Channel 3.

presets.name: Jarre Seq2 (Ch4)
presets.description: Eminent 310 style sequence - warm, filtered highs. MIDI Channel 4.

presets.name: Jarre Lead (Ch6)
presets.description: Expressive Equinoxe lead with vibrato. MIDI Channel 6.

presets.name: Jarre Pad 2 (Ch7)
presets.description: Ethereal Equinoxe ambient pad. MIDI Channel 7.

presets.name: Arpeggiator Demo
presets.description: Simple arpeggiator demo with synth bass sound.

presets.name: Moroder Chase
presets.description: Giorgio Moroder style pulsing synth arp - Midnight Express / Scarface vibes.

presets.name: Disco Donna
presets.description: Donna Summer / I Feel Love style sequenced disco synth.

presets.name: Berlin School
presets.description: Tangerine Dream / Klaus Schulze style sequenced synth with evolving filter.

presets.name: Kraftwerk Robots
presets.description: Precise mechanical electronic sequences - Die Roboter / Trans-Europe Express style.

presets.name: Trance Gate
presets.description: Fast pumping trance gated synth with supersaw and sidechain-style pumping.

presets.name: Ambient Drift
presets.description: Slow evolving generative ambient textures with probability and euclidean rhythms.

presets.name: Seq Moroder Chase
presets.description: Classic Moroder step sequence - Midnight Express / Scarface vibes with slide.

presets.name: Seq I Feel Love
presets.description: Donna Summer / I Feel Love style pulsing 1/16 sequence with octave jumps.

presets.name: Seq Acid Bass
presets.description: TB-303 style acid bass line with slides and accents.

presets.name: Acid Classic
presets.description: Classic acid bassline with TB-303 module and Step Sequencer.

presets.name: Acid Squelch
presets.description: High resonance TB-303 with fast decay and heavy accents.

presets.name: Acid Drone
presets.description: Slow atmospheric TB-303 with long decay and reverb.

presets.name: Moroder Chase 303
presets.description: Giorgio Moroder 3-voice acid chase - Midnight Express / Scarface vibes.

presets.name: Acid Trio
presets.description: 3x TB-303 acid jam - bass, mid, and lead lines.

presets.name: 909 Kit Basic
presets.description: Complete TR-909 drum kit - kick, snare, hihat, clap, toms, rimshot.

presets.name: 909 House
presets.description: Classic house 4-on-the-floor beat with 909 drums and room reverb.

presets.name: Pitch Shifter
presets.description: Real-time pitch shifting with microphone input.

presets.name: Pitch Whammy
presets.description: Synth with LFO-modulated pitch shifting for whammy bar effect.

presets.name: Pipe Organ Test
presets.description: Test preset for Pipe Organ polyphony with Control module.

presets.name: Clock Test
presets.description: Master Clock syncing a Step Sequencer with TB-303 style bass.

presets.name: Clock Multi-Seq
presets.description: Master Clock syncing 2 Step Sequencers + Drum Sequencer with 909 drums.

presets.name: Clock Inputs Demo
presets.description: Demonstrates clock reset input - LFO resets pattern every 4 seconds.

presets.name: Karplus Guitar
presets.description: Plucked guitar arpeggios using Karplus-Strong physical modeling.

presets.name: Karplus Harp
presets.description: Ethereal harp glissandos with lush reverb.

presets.name: Karplus Bass
presets.description: Funky plucked bass line with swing and slides.

presets.name: Euclidean Bass
presets.description: Bass synth driven by E(5,16) Euclidean rhythm.

presets.name: Polyrhythmic Drums
presets.description: Three Euclidean sequencers driving 909 drums: E(3,8), E(5,16), E(7,12).

presets.name: Euclidean Plucks
presets.description: Karplus harp melody filtered by E(5,8) rhythm - ambient arpeggios.

presets.name: Euclidean Acid
presets.description: TB-303 acid line with E(11,16) gate pattern - slides and distortion.

presets.name: FM Electric Piano
presets.description: DX7-style electric piano with 2 operators and chorus.

presets.name: FM Bells
presets.description: Metallic bell tones using 3-operator FM with inharmonic ratios.

presets.name: FM Bass
presets.description: Punchy FM bass with step sequencer and distortion.

presets.name: Synthwave Nightdrive
presets.description: Complex fully sequenced synthwave anthem with layered bass, lead, pad, and 909 groove. Step patterns derived from CC0 MIDI 'movin-on.mid' (m-malandro/CC0-midis).

presets.name: Shepard Basic
presets.description: Classic Shepard tone - endless rising/falling pitch illusion.

presets.name: Shepard Fifths
presets.description: Shepard tone using perfect fifth intervals - more harmonic and musical.

presets.name: Barber Pole
presets.description: Intense barber pole effect with feedback and fast rate - hypnotic spiral.

presets.name: Shepard Dark
presets.description: Deep descending Shepard with bass emphasis - ominous and cinematic.

presets.name: Shepard Ethereal
presets.description: Dreamy ascending Shepard with phase spread - ambient texture.

presets.name: Shepard Organic
presets.description: Living, breathing Shepard with vibrato and shimmer.

presets.name: Shepard Cosmic
presets.description: Deep space ambience with fifth intervals and shimmering stars.

presets.name: Shepard Horror
presets.description: Dissonant, unsettling atmosphere with third intervals.

presets.name: Shepard Glitter
presets.description: Sparkling crystalline texture with maximum shimmer.

presets.name: Shepard Meditation
presets.description: Slow, calming drone with gentle vibrato for relaxation.

presets.name: Shepard Orchestra
presets.description: Three layered Shepards (bass/mid/treble) - infinite orchestral ascension.

presets.name: Shepard Cathedral
presets.description: Four Shepards in contrary motion - infinite cathedral organ.

presets.name: Shepard Universe
presets.description: Five Shepards (Earth/Water/Fire/Air/Ether) - cosmic symphony.

presets.name: Shepard Celestial
presets.description: Three high-frequency Shepards - angelic, crystalline atmosphere.

presets.name: Shepard Morphing
presets.description: Low and high Shepards crossfading via LFOs - spectrum that breathes.

presets.name: Shepard Chaos
presets.description: Sample & Hold driven crossfade - unpredictable spectral shifts.

presets.name: Shepard Infinity
presets.description: Five Shepards with cross-modulation, sweeping filter, and granular chaos.

presets.name: MIDI File Test
presets.description: Test preset for MIDI File Sequencer debugging - CV/Gate outputs to scope.

presets.name: MIDI Organ
presets.description: Organ sound with 3 footages (8', 4', 2'), chorus and spring reverb.

presets.name: Bach 2-Voice Organ
presets.description: Two-voice baroque organ for Bach Inventions. Track 1: Right hand (8'+4'), Track 2: Left hand (8'+4').

presets.name: Bach Pipe Organ
presets.description: Full pipe organ with 5 footages (16', 8', 4', 2-2/3', 2') and cathedral reverb for Bach works.

presets.name: SNES Zelda (8 tracks)
presets.description: Full 8-track Zelda ALTTP style using SNES oscillators. All tracks connected and ready.

presets.name: MIDI Full Organ (8 tracks)
presets.description: Full 8-track MIDI setup with Pipe Organs. All tracks connected and ready.

presets.name: Evolving Drone
presets.description: Slowly evolving harmonic swarm with rich stereo movement.

presets.name: Ascending Swarm
presets.description: Shepard-like ascending harmonic swarm with ethereal shimmer.

presets.name: Spectral Bells
presets.description: Bell-like inharmonic swarm with metallic overtones.

presets.name: Sawtooth Chorus
presets.description: Bright sawtooth swarm with built-in chorus for thick supersaw-like textures.

presets.name: Formant Voice
presets.description: Vocal-like swarm using formant resonance for vowel textures.

presets.name: Frozen Pad
presets.description: Static frozen texture - partials stop evolving for stable pad sounds.

presets.name: Odd Hollow
presets.description: Hollow clarinet-like texture using odd harmonics emphasis.

presets.name: Evolving Bass
presets.description: Deep bass with per-band envelope: slow bass attack, fast high shimmer.

presets.name: Resonator Bells
presets.description: Modal resonator for bell-like tones with internal exciter.

presets.name: Resonator Strings
presets.description: Sympathetic strings mode with 4 voices and noise excitation.

presets.name: Resonator Metallic
presets.description: Inharmonic metallic tones with step sequencer.

presets.name: Resonator Massive
presets.description: 3 resonators en parallèle (Bells, Metal, Strings) jouables au clavier.

presets.name: Resonator Sequence
presets.description: 4 resonators avec patterns Techno (drums) + Moroder (mélodie). Modifiez les séquences!

presets.name: Resonator + 909
presets.description: Fusion! 909 drums + resonators en parallèle sur le même pattern. Ajustez le mix!

presets.name: Wavetable Vocal
presets.description: Vocal formants bank with LFO-controlled position morphing.

presets.name: Wavetable Digital
presets.description: Digital/FM bank with sequenced bass and distortion.

presets.name: Wavetable Organic
presets.description: Organic textures bank with dual LFO modulation.

presets.name: Wavetable Evolve
presets.description: Massive evolving pad with 7-voice unison, morphing, vibrato and lush effects.

presets.name: Wavetable Screamer
presets.description: Aggressive lead with digital bank, ladder filter, distortion and delay.
